name: Zargon
description: Crystal made from monster parts. I wonder what you can make with it?

name: Zealous Rhino
description: All adventurers who use this hairpin have the same problem. When they wear this for a long time, the forehead gets hot.

name: Zebra Eel [2]
description: The spotted eel, living on the shore of Meow Meow Island, is flexible and in the shape of a line, which is suitable to be used a bow.

name: Zero Doll Hat
description: Ultraman Zero, lying on his head, will grow stronger after wearing it!

name: Zircon
description: A gem with a blueish green glow. Being a very rare item, it can be used as equipment or to make high-end headwear.

name: Zorro Masque
